content: The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision is one of the hidden Key Items in The New West. The item can be found after defeating Captain Lotus-Vision within the chapter. However, he is pretty hard to find, unless you know where he is.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Lotus-Vision.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision is one of the hidden Key Items in The New West. The item can be found after defeating Captain Lotus-Vision within the chapter. However, he is pretty hard to find, unless you know where he is.
